message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,250. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,500?
